mapper.select: select * from tbl_food where f_seq = ( select f_seq from TBL_USER_FOOD where u_f_dt = ( select max(u_f_dt) from TBL_USER_FOOD where mb_id=#{mb_id} ) )

SELECT B.u_f_dt, sum( A.F_KCAL) as f_kcal FROM TBL_FOOD A , ( select to_char(u_f_dt,'yymmdd') as u_f_dt, f_seq from TBL_USER_FOOD where mb_id=#{mb_id} and u_f_dt between sysdate-7 and sysdate ) B WHERE A.F_SEQ = B.F_SEQ group by B.u_f_dt

SELECT B.u_f_dt, sum( A.#{mb_fav_ingrident}) as f_choosenut FROM TBL_FOOD A , ( select to_char(u_f_dt,'yymmdd') as u_f_dt, f_seq from TBL_USER_FOOD where mb_id=#{mb_id} and u_f_dt between sysdate-7 and sysdate ) B WHERE A.F_SEQ = B.F_SEQ group by B.u_f_dt
